title: Coinbase, stablecoin startup BVNK walk away from $2B deal: Report
summary: Fortune reports that Coinbase’s $2 billion acquisition of BVNK fell through in the due diligence stage, the final stage before closing a deal.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
summary: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: Prospective CFTC chair to face hearing after Trump pulls first pick
summary: With the US government shutdown expected to end this week, the Senate Agriculture Committee scheduled a hearing to consider President Donald Trump’s pick to head the CFTC.

title: Bitcoin ‘Wave 3’ expansion targets $200K as sell-side pressure fades: Analyst
summary: Analysts say Bitcoin could be starting its Wave III expansion, and if it plays out according to previous instances, BTC could reach the $200,000 to $240,000 range.

title: Three years after FTX’s collapse, creditors wait as the industry rebuilds trust
summary: The 2022 FTX bankruptcy pushed crypto toward greater transparency across exchanges and DeFi, yet some who lost funds in the crisis still haven't been paid.

title: XRP lawyer runs again for US Senate seat in 2026
summary: John Deaton’s campaign announcement primarily focused on his background and cost-of-living issues, but he spoke about digital assets during his 2024 run for the US Senate.

title: ClearToken gets FCA nod for crypto settlement platform amid UK rules push
summary: ClearToken won FCA approval for a regulated crypto settlement system, signaling the UK’s push to bring digital assets under its financial framework.

title: SOL traders’ every wish came true — except for new all-time highs: What gives?
summary: Solana’s fundamentals remain strong, but its recovery toward $250 will depend on easing geopolitical risks and renewed confidence in tech markets.

title: VCI Global unveils crypto treasury plan, backs Tether’s payments arm OOBIT
summary: The Nasdaq-listed company will acquire $100 million in OOB tokens and oversee the digital treasury of OOBIT, a crypto payments company backed by Tether and Solana’s co-founder.

title: Ethereum’s $200B tokenized asset base backs analysts’ calls for higher ETH price
summary: Ethereum’s $200 billion tokenized economy, falling exchange supply and traditional finance footprint are fundamental factors that suggest ETH is undervalued.
